import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a team by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/team/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



FindOne handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve a team by its ID.
It parses the "id" parameter from the request URL, validates it, and calls the teamService to fetch the team.
If the ID is invalid, it responds with a 422 Unprocessable Entity status and an error message.
If the team is not found, it responds with a 404 Not Found status and an error message.
On success, it returns the team data with a 200 OK status.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Team ID","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"account_id":{"type":"integer"},"correlation_id":{"type":"string"},"created_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"},"deleted_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"},"id":{"type":"integer"},"name":{"type":"string"},"ulid":{"type":"string"},"updated_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}}},"404":{"description":"Not Found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
